rejisch@rd vowD@rz in krohs awt Thowz Huw uwv vowDidi
sow WuD ay Yuwsti duw uwz ay tUk may lis tThuD ay ed gah?@n frum Thu bohrD uv @llekshinz @rliy@r i@n~ kumperD i? With may list uv Huw id shown supowrt
owr W@r Wuwz undisayDid ohn Thiy ulekshin

enTh uN ay HAd u list v Thow zit HAd@nt
@n ay Hed piypow WeyDinq eD u fowm bA~k

u Wiy Wuw teyk Yi ti Thuw powlz
if Y@r W@rriyD ibawt izu sumWun Wahchinq Y@r kidz Wiy HAv s@rDifayd tiych@rz Huw Wuwl sit @n Thu kahr With Y@r kiD ohr Wuw si? @n Y@r Howm in Wuw beybiysit fohr Yuw Way Yi gow Du vow?
